Amari Atrium is a modern first class hotel, located on New Petchburi Road just a short walking distance from an underground train station. It is ideally placed for both business and leisure travellers. The Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is only ten minutes away and the main commercial and shopping centers of Sukhumvit and Silom, are easily accessible. The hotel is also close to the expressways for both the existing and new airports. With large, comfortable rooms, a business centre, a fitness centre and an outdoor pool with sundeck and jacuzzi, this city-centre property offers both excellent service and great value-for-money.]]></ReportDetail><LastWriteTime>2007-10-02 오전
